channel.title: The Glitterboys Radioshow
channel.description: The Glitterboys Radioshow with the most bangin' international crossover electro and minimal clubsound. For the editions of current week, check the radiostations - they play it first!
channel.itunes:summary: The Glitterboys Radioshow with the most bangin' international crossover electro and minimal clubsound. For the editions of current week, check the radiostations - they play it first!
channel.itunes:subtitle: by Brian Ferris
channel.itunes:author: Brian Ferris
